articles.title: China hits back with export curbs on chipmaking materials - Financial Times
articles.description: Beijing’s measures involving two metals for tech sector follow controls from the US, Netherlands and Japan
articles.content: China has hit back at US-led semiconductor restrictions by seeking to throttle exports of two metals used in chipmaking and communications equipment as the geopolitical tit-for-tat between the two su… [+2901 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Russia to Cut Oil Exports in August - The Moscow Times
articles.description: Russia's top energy official said Monday that Moscow will voluntarily cut oil exports by 500,000 barrels per day, building on previously announced production cuts.
articles.content:
Russia's top energy official said Monday that Moscow will voluntarily cut oil exports by 500,000 barrels per day, building on previously announced production cuts.
